queries.sqlQuery:
select
	personName,
	countryId,
	sum(case when pos = 1 then 1 else 0 end) Golds,
	sum(case when pos = 2 then 1 else 0 end) Silvers,
	sum(case when pos = 3 then 1 else 0 end) Bronzes
from
	Results
where
	roundTypeId in ('c', 'f')
	and best > 0
	and eventId = '333'
group by
	personName,
	countryId
order by
	Golds desc
limit 20
queries.sqlQueryCustom:
select
	personName,
	countryId,
	sum(case when pos = 1 then 1 else 0 end) Golds,
	sum(case when pos = 2 then 1 else 0 end) Silvers,
	sum(case when pos = 3 then 1 else 0 end) Bronzes
from
	Results
where
	roundTypeId in ('c', 'f')
	and best > 0
	and eventId = '333'
	and personId = '%s'
group by
	personName,
	countryId
order by
	Golds desc
limit 20
